title: Textile, "Fantasia", 1993
medium:
Medium: cotton
Technique: screen printed on plain weave
inscribed: Fantasia Designed by Neil Bottle for Warner Fabrics Copyright MCMCXIII by Warner Fabrics (printed in selvedge)
description: Length of printed cotton with a horizontal lattice of white lines overlaid with a grid of small diamonds, in off-white, tan, and pale orange. Samples of three alternate colorways attached.
